comments: a(n) = sum of n-th row in Wythoff array A003603. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 26 2012]A subsequence of the triangular numbers A000217. In fact, binomial(F(n)+1,2) = A000217(F(n)). - M. F. Hasler, Jan 27 2012
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,1,-5,-1,1).
formula: G.f.: x(x^3-x^2-2x+1)/[(1+x)(1-3x+x^2)(1-x-x^2)].a(n)=((Fibonacci(n)+Fibonacci(n)^2)/2) [From _Gary Detlefs_ Dec 24 2010]A033192 = A000217 o A000045. \\ - M. F. Hasler, Jan 27 2012
author: Simon Norton (simon(AT)dpmms.cam.ac.uk)
